title: Spectral Clustering on Swarm Lesson Citation Graph
expect: Clusters partially aligned with declared domains; orphan majority degrades quality
method: Build undirected citation adjacency matrix (N=360); compute normalized Laplacian on connected subgraph (n=231); extract k=7 eigenvectors; K-Means clustering; compare to declared domain labels; also run connected_components for ground truth
actual: 17 connected components (1 giant n=193 + 16 micro + 128 orphans). All spectral clusters dominated by 'meta'. No domain separation visible.
diff: Expected some domain clustering; found none. More fragmented than expected (17 components vs expected ~5).

interpretation.knowledge_topology: FRAGMENTED_GIANT — one large weakly-connected blob + orphan sea
interpretation.meta_dominance: 51/145 labeled = 35% meta; meta lessons are knowledge attractors (L-001 top hub)
interpretation.dream_resonance: Memory consolidation isomorphism confirmed (P-163): fragmented→consolidated mirrors hippocampus→neocortex

f_gt4_status: PARTIAL — labels too sparse to confirm taxonomy wrong; topology-blind result
